Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BroadcastContent
    Represents a broadcastable content.
    Transformer<T extends BroadcastContent>
    Classes implementing this interface can be used to transform internal server state changed, based on connection specific tags.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncNotifyThread<C extends BroadcastContent>
    This thread blocks and awaits internal state changes (of the broadcastmanager).
    BroadcastContentHasher
    Helper class to generate the MD5 hash of a string-serialized version of broadcast-content.
    BroadcastContentManager<C extends BroadcastContent>
    The Broadcast Content Manager (BCM) maintains a reference to the current ontent state (Broadcast Content).
    IdentityTransformer<T extends BroadcastContent>
    Implementation of the TagSpecificTransformerInterface that returns BroadcastContent as-is, ignoring the received tag.
    ResponseGenerator
    The ResponseGenerator provides one-time notifications about status changes registered by a provided BroadcastContentManager.
